chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following issue:
Package indicated as delivered to the relay point but the relay point declares it has received nothing.
Thank you for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered.
We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

Dear Backcare,

I have informed my logistics partner of this issue and await the POD. 

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

Kindly confirm with the customer whether if they went to this pick up point address below in the attached picture to find their package. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the POD in this message. 

Regards,
CH

Hi ecomobile,

The customer has received the package.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Philbertrice Back Market customer Care
